overview: GLORY 76 will officially take place on December 19. The event was previously postponed due to stricter COVID-19 measures in the Netherlands and the positive COVID-19 test of Badr Hari. This long-awaited event will be headlined by the fight between Badr Hari and Benjamin Adegbuyi and co-headlined by the rubber match title fight between Cédric Doumbé and Murthel Groenhart.
title: GLORY 76: Badr vs. Benny
